channel.title: First game i ever made in Game maker
channel.description:
Im just showing a really simple game, made with game maker. I never used game maker before, so im happy with this result. There are 5 levels at the moment, ill make more later. Theres a teleport to go to the next level :)
Picture: [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/24xiat3.png[/img]
Goal: do not let the moving objects hit you.
Download size: 1.02 MB Files: 1
Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?abwn4k5vxb1gy2x

item.title: First game i ever made in Game maker
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Please stop using it now, and move to a more practical method of developing games. You should look into C++, C#, Java, or any good OOP language really. It’s a lot better in the long run.

Read full topic
item.source: First game i ever made in Game maker
